patthana18.1:2.1_0: Hetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.1:2.1_1: Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.1:3.1_0: Hetuṁ sahetukañca nahetuṁ sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.1:4.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe…
patthana18.1:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.1:6.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte cattāri …pe…
patthana18.1:8.1_0: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:9.1_0: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:9.1_1: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:9.1_2: Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa ca nanahetussa nasahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:10.1_0: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:10.1_1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:10.1_2: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa nasahetukassa ca nanahetussa nasahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:11.1_0: Hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā nahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:11.1_1: Hetu sahetuko ca nahetusahetuko ca dhammā nanahetussa nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.1:12.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve, anantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe cattāri, nissaye pañca, upanissaye cha, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme …pe…
patthana18.1:12.1_1: āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge pañca, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte tīṇi …pe…
patthana18.1:13.1_0: Hetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.1:14.1_0: Nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.1:15.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri.
